sqlj.name: GSSBatchProcessChunk
sqlj.plainsql: SELECT batchProcessChunkID, instanceID, details, status, resultSummary INTO :batchProcessChunkID, :instanceID, :details, :status, :resultSummary FROM GSSBatchProcessChunk WHERE instanceID = :instanceID AND status = :status FOR UPDATE

sqlj.name: SearchServiceRow
sqlj.plainsql: Select SearchServiceRow.objRowId, SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId, SearchServiceRow.extKey, SearchServiceRow.deleted, SearchServiceRow.lastWritten, SearchServiceRow.indexString, SearchServiceRow.extended INTO :objRowId, :searchServiceId, :extKey, :deleted, :lastWritten, :indexString, :extended FROM SearchServiceRow WHERE SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId = :searchServiceId AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten >= :datetime

sqlj.name: SearchServiceRow
sqlj.plainsql: Select SearchServiceRow.objRowId, SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId, SearchServiceRow.extKey, SearchServiceRow.deleted, SearchServiceRow.lastWritten, SearchServiceRow.indexString, SearchServiceRow.extended INTO :objRowId, :searchServiceId, :extKey, :deleted, :lastWritten, :indexString, :extended FROM SearchServiceRow WHERE SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId = :searchServiceId AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten > :datetime

sqlj.name: SearchServiceRow
sqlj.plainsql: SELECT SearchServiceRow.objRowId, SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId, SearchServiceRow.extKey, SearchServiceRow.deleted, SearchServiceRow.lastWritten, SearchServiceRow.indexString, SearchServiceRow.extended INTO :objRowId, :searchServiceId, :extKey, :deleted, :lastWritten, :indexString, :extended FROM SearchServiceRow WHERE SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId = :searchServiceId AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten >= :startTime AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten <= :endTime

sqlj.name: SearchServiceRow
sqlj.plainsql: SELECT SearchServiceRow.objRowId, SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId, SearchServiceRow.extKey, SearchServiceRow.deleted, SearchServiceRow.lastWritten, SearchServiceRow.indexString, SearchServiceRow.extended INTO :objRowId, :searchServiceId, :extKey, :deleted, :lastWritten, :indexString, :extended FROM SearchServiceRow WHERE SearchServiceRow.searchServiceId = :searchServiceId AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten > :startTime AND SearchServiceRow.lastwritten < :endTime

sqlj.name: SearchServiceRow
sqlj.plainsql: SELECT COUNT(*) INTO :count FROM SEARCHSERVICEROW WHERE SEARCHSERVICEID = :searchServiceId
